```{r}
library(Statamarkdown)
```

A first code block:
```{stata first-Stata, collectcode=TRUE} 
sysuse auto
generate gpm = 1/mpg
summarize price gpm
```

A second, later code block:
```{stata second-Stata} 
regress price gpm
```

xfun::session_info('knitr')
